Start time : 15/06/2022 12:00 UTC End time : 15/06/2022 15:00 UTC Service impact : No downtime expected in term of log ingestion, but ES API will not be available for a maximum time of two hours. Service improvement: The indexation backend of Logs Data Platform will be replaced from Elasticsearch to OpenSearch. Kibana instances will be replaced by OpenSearch Dashboards ones. APIv6 calls related to ElasticSearch backend will be automatically redirected to new OpenSearch backend and will remain available until September 2022. The following documentation : https://docs.ovh.com/fr/logs-data-platform/ will be updated few days before the migration.

scheduled_maintenances.name: [GRA, RBX, SBG, BHS / France, Canada][ Cisco ASA firewall]  Baremetal  Cisco ASA firewall  Planned Service End of Life

incident_updates.body: Start time : 28/02/2022 10:00 UTC Service impact : As part of the product lifecycle management we plan to end the baremetal service of Cisco ASA firewall by August 31, 2022. This service interruption will concern only the customers who have previously subscribed to this service. OVHcloud will decommission the service so that you wont be able to connect to your Cisco ASA firewall from that date. Please make the appropriate backup of your data prior that date. --------------------------------------------------- Heure de dbut : 28/02/2022 10:00 UTC Impact du service : Dans le cadre de la gestion du cycle de vie des produits, nous prvoyons de mettre fin au service baremetal du pare-feu Cisco ASA au 31 aout 2022. Cette interruption de service ne concernera que les clients qui ont prcdemment souscrit ce service. OVHcloud mettra le service hors service de sorte que vous ne pourrez plus vous connecter votre pare-feu Cisco ASA partir de cette date. Veuillez effectuer les sauvegardes appropries de vos donnes avant cette date.
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Start time : 21/04/2022 20:00 UTC End time : 22/04/2022 02:00 UTC Service impact : Loss of management IPs only switchs for about 3 mins Service improvement : The objective of this maintenance is to upgrade the infrastructure
